attributes.action: let smokers to be aloud to smoke in certain pubs after a certain time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if this was allowed, then more people would be going out. i am relating to  a lot of pubs have lost custom over the smoking ban. and we are going to end up loosing half of the pubs in the uk if people stop going out because of the financial difficulties. people have coped with smoking in pubs for years before this. so why should it stop now?
